channel.title: Uskaarj News and Announcements
channel.description: All the latest information about Uskaarj

item.title: Unreleased alpha
item.author: invalid@example.com (.:..:)
item.content:encoded:
Since we can pretty safely say this project is dead now, I did work on this project for a little while back in 2010-2011? I made some bugfixes and added bot AI support.

So here you go, if you want to try out some single player action on this mod:
www.klankaos.com/downloads/UT2004USkaarj.rar

Enjoy it while you can.

item.title: Dead?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Maxunit)
item.dc:creator: Maxunit
item.content:encoded:
Heyo guys,

yea...activity was longer ago here, but maybe someone is still alive here. If yes, plz tell me. I tried this mod from time to time and really like it, I just downloaded the "newest" release a few days ago. The original launcher encounters an error, launching it via UT2004 Community menu works. But whenever I hover the buildings tab, the cursor stops working. Then I have to press ESC to go on.

Maybe someone is still active here reading the forums

Greetz,

Maxunit

item.title: Uskaarj News update new terrain maps for uskaarj
item.author: invalid@example.com (barnEbiss)
item.dc:creator: barnEbiss
item.content:encoded:
I am happy to announce that the Silver_Ibex who has been working on creating realistic terrain in UT2k4 is going to be working on making some terrain maps for USkaarj for our RTS Mod. He has given me permission to release the first image and download link of a new map of his he is experimenting with. And is a good sign of what type of terrain maps we can expect once he gets to work on making the new uskaarj maps.

...

Uskaarj News update new terrain maps for uskaarj

item.title: USkaarj news update “New mix of main menu music”
item.author: invalid@example.com (barnEbiss)
item.dc:creator: barnEbiss
item.content:encoded:
Our DJ has done a new version of the main menu, and has sent it in to be released.
This version is slightly longer then the last one. So enjoy and let us know when you think of the new version also remember these are just test tracks and may be completely changed or replaced with a different song in the final version

http://www.uskaarj.com/UskaarjMusicdemo/uskaarj-ex2.mp3

item.title: would like to help
item.author: invalid@example.com (wacko)
item.dc:creator: wacko
item.content:encoded: hey all am a coder looking to help...

item.title: Not dead, are you?
item.author: invalid@example.com (stephen_wq)
item.dc:creator: stephen_wq
item.content:encoded:
Hmmmm no general discussion forum.......
Anyway, RTS games are great, im yet to download this mod.
I have the whole C&C series, and have played a little and own the whole close combat series.
So is this mod dead? i mean i wouldnt know, first time here, but i mean you people could be hard at work doing another release, i wouldnt know.
So, i hope i enjoy this when i download it, and it looks great.

item.title: Hey guys!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Daemon13)
item.dc:creator: Daemon13
item.content:encoded:
Hey, I just found your mod today and downloaded the beta. I love RTS games and the graphics on this one are insane! I love the way the game looks and gameplay feels. I had one comment which I'm not sure if your working on but have you thought of putting the name of the building and the resources needed when your highliting a structure your going to build? Anyways I hope you guys are still working on this mod, it's great. Keep up the good work.

Daemon

item.title: My condolences to the USkaarj-Team <3
item.author: invalid@example.com ([GDC]Faust)
item.dc:creator: [GDC]Faust
item.content:encoded:
Hi, You probably don't know me, but I've lurken around your site from time to time always watching the things you do in amazement. I guess if I knew that you were so terribly lacking a fanbase I should have posted something but if you decide to stop working on this project, it's your own decision, as it is your project.

At first that I saw this mod, about 5 or so months ago, I was totally astounded about what is possible with the Unrealengine, and as a Coder/Mapper myself I could vaguely...

My condolences to the USkaarj-Team <3

item.title: Trouble playing USkaarj
item.author: invalid@example.com (olivehehe_03)
item.dc:creator: olivehehe_03
item.content:encoded: Hello. I took one look at USkaarj and just HAD to download it, but the problem is, I can't get it to work. I've tried going into community>user mods> and activating it from there, but it thinks that my CD-Key is invalid. I've got a legitimate copy of the game, and all the other mods I have work fine, but i just seem to be having trouble with yours. Any idea what's wrong?

item.title: USkaarj News Update "April Fools"
item.author: invalid@example.com (barnEbiss)
item.dc:creator: barnEbiss
item.content:encoded:
For those of you who saw the site and believed it last morning, all I can is that was for April fools day. Everything is back to normal and we are working on getting stuff done.

We have just finished getting our new Sub version server setup for the coders to use and I have sent the log info to them, so they will be starting in on the coding again.

Also our new DJ has been working on some sample songs for the new main menu for uskaaj2k4 and he should have a sample ready to show sometime...

USkaarj News Update "April Fools"

item.title: Greetings fellow modders. :)
item.author: invalid@example.com (CqR)
item.dc:creator: CqR
item.content:encoded:
Hi there,

First off all, I wanna tell you guys a little about me.
As you can see my nick is called CqR. I'm very happy to take part in this modding scene and I'm deligthed to say this is my first project.
Basicly I'm gonna support the mod team with music for all maps. Music has a special place for me and I've started this hobby at the age of 13. In the time being I've been able to teach myself a various number of styles. Mostly all digital but also orchestra.
Anyways, I'm sure we...

Greetings fellow modders.

item.title: Servers, yeah I know
item.author: invalid@example.com (Crusard)
item.dc:creator: Crusard
item.content:encoded: if anybody wants to play, maybe we could arrange a time or something. Can't wait to try this online

item.title: Uskaarj makes it to finalists on MSU
item.author: invalid@example.com (barnEbiss)
item.dc:creator: barnEbiss
item.content:encoded:
Last night I learned that we made it to the MSU finalists list and that we can now compete in the final part of the contest. We had hopes we would make it this far and we are honored we made it, and we are not stopping in our work and we will continue to strive to improve USkaarj and get the rest of the stuff in game that did not make it into the first public alpha and fix the bugs that have been reported. So expect news soon from the development front.

barnEbiss
Uskaarj mod leader

item.title: Uskaarj News Update “New Barracks Building Finished”
item.author: invalid@example.com (barnEbiss)
item.dc:creator: barnEbiss
item.content:encoded:
Well our modeler Polycron has been busy and he has just finished the human’s new barracks building. The image page has been updated with the two new images of the humans barrack building so check out the image page and be sure to let us know what you think of the new building.

barnEbiss

item.title: You know whats cool?
item.author: invalid@example.com (maniac12ca)
item.dc:creator: maniac12ca
item.content:encoded:
when maniac returns from stalking Barn....err..the shadows..yes..


when maniac returns from the shadows and starts to post!

Just checked the site for the first tiem in a while. Ima hafta re-install 2K4 and try the alpha

item.title: GG dudes!
item.author: invalid@example.com (igNiTion)
item.dc:creator: igNiTion
item.content:encoded:
Sorry didn't get around to posting earlier...but this mod is lookin' nice!!

What you have now seems to be a great base for an rts mod, I love the levels and everything...and the graphics are better than C&C generals

I wish you could zoom in more though...right now the soldiers are just tiny little dots on the screen. EVerything seems pretty solid though, from building to resource gathering. I love the models a lot also, the buildings are great

Keep up the awesome work,...

GG dudes!

item.title: Humans base construction bot "Finished"
item.author: invalid@example.com (barnEbiss)
item.dc:creator: barnEbiss
item.content:encoded:
well I said we would soon have the picture of the humans base contruction bot well today I happy to show the finished model in all it glory. Enjoy





And be sure to let us know what you think of them

item.title: USkaarj2k4 interviewed by Ladygamers.com
item.author: invalid@example.com (barnEbiss)
item.dc:creator: barnEbiss
item.content:encoded:
Last week I did a short interview with Caligirl from over at ladygamers.com.
Along with the interview I gave them 6 exclusive pics of our latest map that you will find nowhere else. So what are you waiting for head on over to this link http://www.ladygamers.com/focus/june2004.htm

And be sure to let us know what you think of the new pics
